lead_paragraph: In the city that really does never sleep, there are always novelties, and in early January ones that you might have overlooked at a busier time of the year.
snippet: In the city that really does never sleep, there are always novelties, and in early January ones that you might have overlooked at a busier time of the year.

headline.main: Downtime at New Year? It’s Filled
headline.seo: In Books and Fine Arts, Filling the Down Time of New Year’s
headline.print_headline: Downtime At New Year? It’s Filled
